root.name: Wiz 'n' Liz: The Frantic Wabbit Wescue
root.description: Far far away on the planet Pum the Wabbits were happy. That is until...Thats the intro to Wiz 'n' Liz: The Frantic Wabbit Wescue, a fast paced video game starring two wizards named Wiz and Liz. The Wabbits have been taken and it is now up to our wizards to "wescue" them by running around, turning them into letters and then collect the letters to complete a word.
